messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] MUST READ site
messages.msgSnippet: ... For the clueless who are having technical difficulties or something what exactly do you click to get the info? The things I saw mentioning the Shinsengumi
messages.messageBody:
secretary wrote:

>http://f40.aaa.livedoor.jp/%7Epaulnobu/index.html
>
>
>
For the clueless who are having technical difficulties or something
what exactly do you click to get the info? The things I saw mentioning
the Shinsengumi are not "clickable". and what was clickable pertained to
the Warring States era

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: MUST READ site
messages.msgSnippet: translate using http://www.nifty.com/globalgate ***warning Nifty translations show up in green....the page background is ALSO green -_- ***translations on this
messages.messageBody:
translate using http://www.nifty.com/globalgate
***warning Nifty translations show up in green....the page
background is ALSO green -_-
***translations on this page also "overlap" text on text
http://f40.aaa.livedoor.jp/%7Epaulnobu/index.html

contains photos and info on the [prison] used in Kyoto (before and
*during* the time of the Shinsengumi)

photos and info of the redlight district and explains more about the
ranking system for geisha

the recurring problems with Kondou (look for the word Tengu <<<
reference to the Serizawa Kamo party...the article mentions Saitou,
Sannan/Yamanami and another man)

the controversy of Akesato's existence

more details about Nagakura's petition (a total of 6 guys involved)
